subject: Greetings.
body:
Greetings.
Have you received your ID card, you said it will take 2/3 weeks right I kindly inform you if you have your ID card now so we can process your loan right away thank you.
Best Regards
Global loan.

subject: Re:    Greetings.
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out. I appreciate your concern about the ID card and loan process. However, I'm afraid I haven't received my ID card yet. Could you please tell me more about the loan process? What are the steps involved?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Vernon
